sentences.sContent: It was he who first suggested the idea.
sentences.sCn: 是他先提出这个想法的。

sentences.sContent: ...he would start recording his whole life in detail...
...and began to test her: he would give her a date and ask her to tell him about the world events on that day...
...He knew my love for yoga and had seen a space close to where he lived that he thought might be good to serve as a yoga studio...
...he discovered that less than 10% of their supposed members agreed on who exactly was on the team...
...Ben’s given up making those terrible faces he used to make...
...When he looked closer he realized it was a huge group of bees...
...and he will give you the details of the weather...
...And he can load them onto the shuttle for you when it arrives...

trans.tranOther: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
